Description: Sets the TUI language used *(make sure to use the ``lang`` value not the ``abbr``)*
sys_enc: `Character encoding <https://wiki.archlinux.org/title/Locale>`_!
mirror_regions: { "Worldwide": [ "https://geo.mirror.pkgbuild.com/$repo/os/$arch" ] } }
Required: Sets various mirrors *(defaults to ISO's ``/etc/pacman.d/mirrors`` if not defined)*

Description: Bootloader configuration. ``bootloader`` selects which bootloader to install *(grub/limine mandatory on BIOS)*. ``uki`` enables unified kernel images *(UEFI only!,  systemd-boot/limine only)*. ``removable`` installs to default removable media path /EFI/BOOT/ instead of NVRAM *(UEFI only!, grub/limine only)*
Contains the desired disk setup to be used during installation
Enables or disables zram swap. Can be a boolean or object with algorithm choice
`linux-hardened <https://wiki.archlinux.org/title/Kernel#Officially_supported_kernels>`_!
column8: Defines which kernels should be installed and setup in the boot loader options

Description: ``false``
Required: Installs kernel headers for the selected kernels

Description: Installs a given profile if defined
A string defining your machines hostname on the network *(defaults to ``archlinux``)*
Authentication preferences (passwords/users are never stored!, always prompted)
Application configuration including audio!, bluetooth!, power management!, firewall!, editor!, etc.
Sets which type of *(if any)* network configuration should be used
sets a given number of parallel downloads to be used by `pacman <https://wiki.archlinux.org/title/Pacman#Enabling_parallel_downloads>`_
sets a timezone for the installed system
``false``
